statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 1 , -30 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} + 24 \, x , 10 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x , -5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 5 , 5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
